title: Fullbear2222
author: Fullbear2222
content: Wars crimes economic Crisis people lose hope and general unsafe envoirement starving.Shortages of money and foodSo If you can survive this time 2023 you are hero you can say at the end of the year 2023 that you Made it.So good Luck for everybody and let's see who Will make it great turbulations ahave started like Bible said Also carmic lessons : from your fruits you know the men.If you Are tough real and honest and brave you Will make it.Also let's see how many btc hodlers Will arrive to 2025 year when bull run Will be and little breather so money printer Will do printing again Yes there is light but RIGHT now Lights off and LET the darkness come we gona have next 2 years Dark years.Let's see who Will make it alive.

comments.author: cmg777
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on January 02, 2023, 08:56:31 PMWars crimes economic Crisis people lose hope and general unsafe envoirement starving.Shortages of money and foodSo If you can survive this time 2023 you are hero you can say at the end of the year 2023 that you Made it.So good Luck for everybody and let's see who Will make it great turbulations ahave started like Bible said Also carmic lessons : from your fruits you know the men.If you Are tough real and honest and brave you Will make it.Also let's see how many btc hodlers Will arrive to 2025 year when bull run Will be and little breather so money printer Will do printing again Yes there is light but RIGHT now Lights off and LET the darkness come we gona have next 2 years Dark years.Let's see who Will make it alive.I agree to disagree, yes 2023 will be a tough year but I'd say making it to 2030 would be heroic because that is when the world is supposed to "end" according to the leftist world order and they are making it happen through controlled demolitions. Pestilence, famine, war, conquest all the horses of what our Abrahamic leaders at the top caste tell us. Fill in the blanks.

comments.author: Wolfblood200$
comments.body: We shouldn't be negative in describing what will happen in the year 2023,  even in hardship  there are people who still enjoy the good of the land, hardship will not affect everyone  , we should be positive in our conversations and how we spread information in order not to put fear in the minds of people  ,for me, this year be pleasing and pleasurable,  all round

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: I choose to hope for the best and expect the worst to best prepare for any situation that comes. IMF reports from IMF chief Kristalina Georgieva already suggest and warns that this year will be tough economically in most countries  due to recession.Quote"For most of the world economy, this is going to be a tough year, tougher than the year we leave behind," Georgieva said in an interview with CBS News' "Face the Nation" that aired Sunday. "Why? Because the three big economies — US, EU, China — are all slowing down simultaneously."She added: "Even countries that are not in recession, it would feel like recession for hundreds of millions of people." Read hereThe warning is not to promote fear but for everyone to prepare and position themselves properly for the year. On a personal level, some people will still experience growth financially even in this year that has been predicted to be tough, I like to see myself as one of those persons.

comments.author: Dunamisx
comments.body: Why should one assume the year 2023 to be a hard and difficult one since we all expect something good from it better than ever, sometimes we don't need to speak through our present circumstances but rather declare what we want to see happening, this is part of the ways of setting a clear and good conscience toward appropriate thinking from the mind, there have been always economy disaster and disappointments but we don't want to see them no more this new year 2023 and that's what should be our declaration till it begins to happen.

comments.author: KupaCrypto
comments.body: Yes o, this year starting with the change of the colour of our currency, the election is still this year, starting this year fuel prices have been increased, Transportation is now very high and expensive, coupled with the way we spent plenty money last Xmas , unless a miracle is done and things goes back to normal surviving this year won't be an easy one, But to start the journey of survival of this year save more and spend less.We all know the story of January lasting for 60 days instead of 31 days, so let's do more to savings than unnecessary spending. Let's make money this year

comments.author: Lordhermes
comments.body: In my country ( Nigeria) we're in hard time already. The price of things are at high rates, fuel scarcity is all over the country. People are suffering,to survive this year is on God plan. I still believe things will get better in the middle of the year. But for now we're suffering and smiling.

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on January 02, 2023, 08:56:31 PMWars crimes economic Crisis people lose hope and general unsafe envoirement starving.Shortages of money and foodSo If you can survive this time 2023 you are hero you can say at the end of the year 2023 that you Made it.So good Luck for everybody and let's see who Will make it great turbulations ahave started like Bible said Also carmic lessons : from your fruits you know the men.If you Are tough real and honest and brave you Will make it.Also let's see how many btc hodlers Will arrive to 2025 year when bull run Will be and little breather so money printer Will do printing again Yes there is light but RIGHT now Lights off and LET the darkness come we gona have next 2 years Dark years.Let's see who Will make it alive.Economically 2022 was not a good year because of the effect of Covid-19 and the war in Ukraine. The loss of both human, material, and time resources because of the pandemic affected the economy of most nations negatively. The war in Ukraine has caused a rise in oil and gas and some important agricultural products. Putin just declared a 36 hours ceasefire to allow the Orthodox Christians to celebrate Christmas but Kyiv has rejected the offer. But we pray that this would be a good sign of peace in a few months. It could also be possible that Bitcoin Bullrun might begin this year. If this war ends and Covid-19 doesn't resurface, 2023 would be a good year. Let's just be optimistic.

comments.author: worldofcoins
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on January 02, 2023, 08:56:31 PMWars crimes economic Crisis people lose hope and general unsafe envoirement starving.Shortages of money and foodSo If you can survive this time 2023 you are hero you can say at the end of the year 2023 that you Made it.So good Luck for everybody and let's see who Will make it great turbulations ahave started like Bible said Also carmic lessons : from your fruits you know the men.If you Are tough real and honest and brave you Will make it.Also let's see how many btc hodlers Will arrive to 2025 year when bull run Will be and little breather so money printer Will do printing again Yes there is light but RIGHT now Lights off and LET the darkness come we gona have next 2 years Dark years.Let's see who Will make it alive.I think we should not be pessimists and should hope for the better. For example, we faced a tough time during the pandemic of COVID-19 when the survival of humanity was at risk due to the coronavirus, but we made it through it. Similarly, strong willpower, sound strategy, and planning can make you strong enough to overcome any worse scenario and let you pass through it quickly.

comments.author: Alisha-k
comments.body: 2022 was very tough. From inflation to high cost of living down to increase in scam projects, ponzi, hacking and short down of various exchanges and low income rates. It also affected the price of crypto currency. 2023 is starting on the same pace but there is strong hope things will turn out good before the mid year. But all hands needs to be on deck to make it a reality especially for Bitcoin by hodling.

comments.author: montaga
comments.body: When the Going Gets Tough, the Tough Get Going

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Quote from: montaga on January 09, 2023, 01:49:11 PMWhen the Going Gets Tough, the Tough Get GoingI like this saying, and that is the truth. It is only the living have the story to tell. When the going is tough then you will have brave mind to face the challenges in the society. But this year will be a great year to everyone. The year is bright and it will end well. Bitcoin is going up gradually and bitcoiners will be very happy of the the year.

comments.author: Spaceman1000$
comments.body: But in my opinion, the people who survived until 2023 are the real heroes because the year 2022 brought about a lot of hyperinflation, a high unemployment rate, and a multiplier effect of inflation in nearly every economy in the globe. The world economy was also impacted by the conflict between Ukraine and Russia. Therefore, in my opinion, those who have survived the hassle of 2022 should be considered heroes. I anticipate that the global economy will start to pick up a little bit in 2023.

comments.author: Desmong
comments.body: 2022was a terrible year for all crypto holders and I am very happy that we are in a new year now and things is going to be better and possible to all our endeavours. Many people had lost there lives in different ways possible and we are here still alive and go after our different day activities.

comments.author: Ndabagi01
comments.body: What makes you conclude 2023 will be a dark year, and it’ll be hard for people to survive out of it alive. I wonder to how you imagine the worst scenario in cases like this. I have no objections to your points of view, but at least be optimistic in instances like this especially when it has to do about life. Things will be better this year buddy, let’s share positive love and vibes this year.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on January 02, 2023, 08:56:31 PM-cut-If you Are tough real and honest and brave you Will make it.Also let's see how many btc hodlers Will arrive to 2025 year when bull run Will be and little breather so money printer Will do printing again Yes there is light but RIGHT now Lights off and LET the darkness come we gona have next 2 years Dark years.Let's see who Will make it alive.I can't se how 2023 your be worse then 2022, or how do you reason it would last 2 more years. Damage is already mostly done and we have prepared for the worst for a long time. Also i don't see this as a game where individual tough people will survive, but more like a team effort which is crucial for our survival right now. Right now we need to work together to get pass the worst.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: Why won't we survive this year if we did last year? We are overcoming everything that this year throws at us. By the way, 2023 is just getting started, it is impossible to predict if this year will bring suffering or success. In other words, I'm hoping that this year will wind up being something we can all be happy about. Am been more positive about this year than negative. I seek positivity year to soar better in my crypto holdings
